text: The Battle of Sahela, was a minor military engagement during the 2017 Iraqi- Kurdish conflict, between the Iraqi army and the Peshmerga, that occurred on 26, October, 2017. ==Background== The Iraqi army and the Popular Mobilization Forces (PMF), tried to advance toward the Kurdish semi-autonomous region, after the takeover of Kirkuk and the 2017 Kurdistan Region independence referendum. ==Battle== The Iraqi Army and the Popular Mobilization Forces (PMF), have attacked the Peshmarga on 26 October, 2017, In a goal to capture Fesh Khabur and Sahela. The battle ended in a Kurdish victory, https://hawlerweb.net/kurdistan/2024/10/92381/https://darkamazi.net/sorani/archives/1040138. and heavy casualties among the Iraqi lines. ==Related pages== * Kurdistan * Iraq * Battle of Akre (1983) == References ==
title: Battle of Sahela
